last_episode_to_air.name: Tomorrow Comes Beyond the Field
last_episode_to_air.overview: Zhao Jinyuns continue their fight against the Shadow of Orion.

name: Inazuma Eleven: Ares no Tenbin
original_name: イナズマイレブン　アレスの天秤
overview:
Ares depicts an alternative canon following the events of the first season of the original Inazuma Eleven anime after their victory in the Football Frontier, with the alien attack from the second season never occurring. When Japanese soccer has been deemed weak compared to international competition, the Raimon Eleven disbanded with its members transferring into different soccer teams across the country to strengthen Japan's soccer at a national level. Furthermore, sponsorship has become a vital aspect in a Japanese youth soccer team's survival as it prevents a team's disbandment while being essential to partake in matches.

The series focuses on the forward Asuto Inamori and his team, Inakuni Raimon, which is made up of players from the remote Inakunijima Island. Needing to maintain their club, they have replaced the original Raimon Eleven as Raimon Junior High's soccer team and compete as underdogs in the annual Football Frontier youth tournament.

seasons.name: Specials
seasons.overview: Inazuma Eleven Outer Code is a series of original anime shorts that take place in an alternate timeline where the aliens' attack never happened. It consists of 6 stories and serves as a bridge between the original series and the new series, Inazuma Eleven Ares no Tenbin.

seasons.name: Ares no Tenbin
seasons.overview:
Ares depicts an alternative canon following the events of the first season of the original Inazuma Eleven anime after their victory in the Football Frontier, with the alien attack from the second season never occurring.

The series focuses on the forward Asuto Inamori and his team, Inakuni Raimon, which is made up of players from the remote Inakunijima Island. Needing to maintain their club, they have replaced the original Raimon Eleven as Raimon Junior High's soccer team and compete as underdogs in the annual Football Frontier youth tournament.

seasons.name: Orion no Kokuin
seasons.overview: Orion no Kokuin revolves around a team called "Inazuma Japan"—composed of the best players of the previous Inazuma Eleven installments—that will act as a Japanese national team and will face teams from around the world.

episodes.name: Setting Sail to Tomorrow
episodes.overview: The bright and positive Sonny Wright along with his passionate teammates make the difficult decision of leaving their island home to continue their one joy in life; soccer.

episodes.name: The Devil of the Field
episodes.overview: Sonny and the new Raimon Eleven struggle to understand the training given to them by their odd manager, Mister Yi.

episodes.name: The Mysterious Coach Zhao Jinyun
episodes.overview: The odd methods continue as Mister Yi gears the Raimon team up for their first official match against the school with an incredible defense, Rampart Jr. High.

episodes.name: Will It Fall?! The Impregnable Fortress
episodes.overview: The day is finally here. It's Raimon vs Rampart and Mister Yi is still up to his strange tactics.

episodes.name: The Darkness of Seisho Academy
episodes.overview: Though an incredible striker, Elliot Ember fails to command his teammates' respect due to his inconsistent attendance and performance.

episodes.name: The Flame Ace Striker
episodes.overview: Things heat up as Polestar Academy goes against Kirkwood Junior High. Renowned Flame Striker, Axel Blaze, leads Kirkwood players with great teamwork and powerful moves.

episodes.name: The Light That Comes into Sight
episodes.overview: With Elliot's evolution into a dependable ace striker, Polestar Academy finally finds its footing against Kirkwood.

episodes.name: A Day Without the Coach
episodes.overview: The Raimon Eleven are left on their own against the analytical team, Anima Sana, in the 3rd round prelim.

episodes.name: Commander Kageyama Reiji's Clever Scheme
episodes.overview: The diabolical Ray Dark is once again the commander of the Royal Academy team, despite being previously condemned.

episodes.name: Clash! Emperor Penguin VS Polar Bear!!
episodes.overview: The morale of Royal Academy starts to fall apart when the players find out Ray Dark's dishonest approach.

episodes.name: The Night Before the Battle, Asuto's Decision
episodes.overview: Sonny feels lost about his motive for playing soccer. Then, he receives a letter from his late mother with a message that may change everything.

episodes.name: Burning Haizaki
episodes.overview: In the final match of the preliminaries, it's once again Raimon vs Polestar.

episodes.name: Fierce! The Final Stage of the Storm!!
episodes.overview: Determined to crush Raimon, Elliot's onslaught is relentless. However, even with Sonny's injured leg, the eleven stand firm.

episodes.name: The Moonlight Emperor
episodes.overview: The Football Frontier finals begin and the story of the mysterious Heath Moore is about to unfold.

episodes.name: The Emperor's Anguish
episodes.overview: Elliot's chance for revenge is here as Polestar faces off against Lunar Prime.

episodes.name: The Double Prince of the Snowfield
episodes.overview: Raimon may be facing their toughest opponents yet - Alpine Jr. High. Alpine Jr. High is a refined school from the north, known for their top strikers.

episodes.name: Explosion! Operation Snow Princess
episodes.overview: Here to shake things up, Bunny Cottontail has entered the field. An unpredictable force, Bunny is a beginner at the game but an incredibly fast learner and runner.

episodes.name: The Sun Garden's Dream
episodes.overview: Raimon's next opponent is the brilliant Alia Academy, but Alia faces their own darkness.

episodes.name: The Ultimate Personal Technique
episodes.overview: With Hunter on the bench, Alia Academy is in trouble.

episodes.name: The Ultimate Technique, Its Name Is...
episodes.overview: Xavier blasts through as a one-man show, but soccer is a team sport. To have a chance at winning this game Hunter will have to convince Xavier to trust his teammates.

episodes.name: Scattered Eleven
episodes.overview: The Raimon Eleven are on cloud nine from reaching the semi-finals, that is until they hear they'll be facing the legendary goalie and captain, Mark Evans.

episodes.name: The Legendary Captain
episodes.overview: Under the legendary Mark Evans, Everytown Junior High has become a formidable opponent. Maxime must rise to the occasion and bring the Raimon Eleven together.

episodes.name: Surpassing the Legend!
episodes.overview: Now that Maxime has stepped up and rallied the team, the Raimon Eleven are back in business.

episodes.name: Nosaka's Declaration of War
episodes.overview: The final showdown between Raimon and Lunar Prime is almost here, but illness and injury plague both teams.

episodes.name: Clashing Soccer!!
episodes.overview: It's the final battle: Raimon vs. Lunar Prime. Will Heath and Elliot be able to overcome their animosity and play honestly? This heated match is just getting started.

episodes.name: Dash to the Top
episodes.overview: The second half is under way and it's the fiercest fight yet. With Sonny, Elliot, and Heath all aiming for victory, who will come out on top?

1.name: Ares no Tenbin
1.overview:
Ares depicts an alternative canon following the events of the first season of the original Inazuma Eleven anime after their victory in the Football Frontier, with the alien attack from the second season never occurring.

The series focuses on the forward Asuto Inamori and his team, Inakuni Raimon, which is made up of players from the remote Inakunijima Island. Needing to maintain their club, they have replaced the original Raimon Eleven as Raimon Junior High's soccer team and compete as underdogs in the annual Football Frontier youth tournament.

episodes.name: Gate to the World
episodes.overview: The day has finally arrived and the players who are going to represent Inazuma Japan have been selected.

episodes.name: The Lost Final Weapon
episodes.overview: Inazuma Japan start their first Football Frontier International match against South Korea's team, Red Bison.

episodes.name: Those With the Mark
episodes.overview: With Gouenji Shuuya being injured for Inazuma Japan, Kira Hiroto replaces him and the rivalry between Hiroto and Haizaki Ryouhei begins.

episodes.name: Laughing Ichihoshi
episodes.overview: Inazuma Japan are training for the upcoming match against Australia but they have no info on the team, so they have no idea what kind of plays Australia has.

episodes.name: The Wooden Horse of Troy
episodes.overview: Inazuma Japan start their match against Australia, but they're having trouble keeping up with Australia's plays.

episodes.name: Kido's Counterattack
episodes.overview: The match between Inazuma Japan and Australia continues with the second half.

episodes.name: The Planned Trap
episodes.overview: The match between Inazuma Japan and Shining Satans finally comes to an end.

episodes.name: Inazuma Japan's Greatest Crisis
episodes.overview: Inazuma Japan start training for their next match against Uzbekistan's team, Eternal Dancers.

episodes.name: The Emperor's Return
episodes.overview: Nosaka Yuuma is finally back with the team after his brain surgery and is the captain for Inazuma Japan during the second half of the match between Inazuma Japan and Eternal Dancers.

episodes.name: The Emperor's Counterattack
episodes.overview: Inazuma Japan manages to win the match against Eternal Dancers with a score of 4-2, however after the match Ichihoshi Mitsuru tries to accuse Nosaka of doping as he did to Kidou Yuuto.

episodes.name: The Emperor's Scenario
episodes.overview: Inazuma Japan prepare for their next match against Saudi Arabia with Nosaka Yuuma showing the team the training.

episodes.name: Ichihoshi, The Last Choice
episodes.overview: Ichihoshi is torn between saving his brother and playing soccer as he wants to do.

episodes.name: Japan, A New Brilliance
episodes.overview: The first half between Inazuma Japan and Saudi Arabia ended with a score of 1-0.

episodes.name: Glittering☆Soccer Boy
episodes.overview: Kimura Yousuke interviews Inamori Asuto, Haizaki Ryouhei, and Nosaka Yuuma.

episodes.name: Zhao Jin Yun's Apprentice
episodes.overview: The Asian finals are coming and Inazuma Japan will face China's team.

episodes.name: I'm in the Team
episodes.overview: Ichihoshi Hikaru feels guilty for what he has done to the team when he thought he was Ichihoshi Mitsuru and helps the team in every way he can, so they can forgive him.

episodes.name: The Surprising Triple Keeper
episodes.overview: Inazuma Japan start their match against China's national team, Soccer Acrobatic Troupe but without their coach since he is absent, making Kudou Michiya the main coach for the match.

episodes.name: Gojin Stands on the Field
episodes.overview: Inazuma Japan continue their match against Soccer Acrobatic Troupe.

episodes.name: Aim for the Big Stage!
episodes.overview: The end of the match is slowly approaching and Inazuma Japan are having a difficult time scoring against Soccer Acrobatic Troupe while they are also having a difficult time scoring.

episodes.name: A Party for a New Journey
episodes.overview: After winning the FFI prelims, Inazuma Japan is invited aboard a ship for a luxury dinner party.

episodes.name: Thinking About Feelings Toward the Sea
episodes.overview: Before departing to Russia for the Football Frontier International, Inazuma Japan's members visit their respective schools to meet their friends and family to see them.

episodes.name: Viva! Above the World
episodes.overview: Inazuma Japan are travelling to Russia by plane and each member does something to make the time pass by quickly.

episodes.name: The World's Wall
episodes.overview: ( Most of the episode is a rerun of Inazuma Eleven Reloaded.)

episodes.name: Let's Walk in Russia
episodes.overview: Inazuma Japan have some time before their first match, so they decide to explore Russia.

episodes.name: The Obstructing Giant God
episodes.overview: Starting off the Football Frontier International in Russia, Inazuma Japan go up against Invincible Giant.

episodes.name: The General's Glimmer
episodes.overview: Inazuma Japan continue their match against Muteki no Giant but they are having a hard time keeping up with Spain, who made their third goal with Twin Lancer. Inazuma Japan try to score another goal with Last Resort but Nosaka Yuuma sees that's still incomplete, so it gets easily stopped by Spain's defense. They then decide to depend on Inamori Asuto to get through Spain's players. Can Asuto turn the match around?

episodes.name: Asuto! Run Towards Victory!
episodes.overview: Inazuma Japan continue their match against Invincible Giant but they are having a hard time keeping up with Spain, who made their third goal with Twin Lancer. Inazuma Japan try to score another goal with Last Resort but Nosaka Yuuma sees that's still incomplete, so it gets easily stopped by Spain's defense. They then decide to depend on Inamori Asuto to get through Spain's players. Can Asuto turn the match around?

episodes.name: Ichinose Sinks in a Coup d'état
episodes.overview: Between training sessions, Haizaki, Gouenji, Nosaka, and Endou go scout out the American team based on Asuto's suggestion. However, instead of scouting out the team, Asuto and the others end up playing against Ichinose and the others in a mini-game.

episodes.name: Aphrodi Descends
episodes.overview: Aphrodi joins Inazuma Japan. The members of Inazuma Japan play a 4 on 4 mini-game. Asuto finally meets a mysterious man claiming to be his father.

episodes.name: The Eye of God
episodes.overview: Inazuma Japan are about to start their match against Navy Invader but Inamori Asuto is running late since he is still talking to Inamori Masato, his dad.

episodes.name: Air on the GGG String
episodes.overview: Inazuma Japan continue their match against Navy Invader. Bahat Descom is arrested. Mack Scride takes over as Navy Invader's coach and Ichinose, Domon and Mark join. The episode ends with Inazuma Japan in the lead with a score of 3-2.

episodes.name: Revive! Phoenix
episodes.overview: Inazuma Japan continue their match against Navy Invader with Domon Asuka, Ichinose Kazuya and Mark Kruger, three players from Star Unicorn, joining Navy Invader.

episodes.name: Asuto's Disappearance
episodes.overview: Perfect Spark defeats Muteki no Giant with a score 6-0. Inamori Asuto visits the training facility of Orion. Fudou Akio is shown to be injured. Inamori Asuto gets captured by the Orion Foundation.

episodes.name: The Shocking New Members
episodes.overview: The members of Inazuma Japan are worried about Inamori Asuto who has suddenly disappeared after he went with his father to an Orion facility. Despite that, two new members appear before Inazuma Japan and they look familiar to the players of Inakuni Raimon but they look different from their previous appearances. Who are they?

episodes.name: Magnificent Froy
episodes.overview: Inazuma Japan's last match in their group is about to begin against Perfect Spark but Inamori Asuto hasn't returned from his trip with his father.

episodes.name: Lonely Froy
episodes.overview: Inazuma Japan continue their match against Perfect Spark. Froy Girikanan and Viktor Sedov leave the match as protest after Perfect Spark uses Aurora Wave, applied with tear gas. Inamori joins Perfect Spark.

episodes.name: The Warrior with the Black Bandanna
episodes.overview: nazuma Japan is still playing a match against Perfect Spark but Perfect Spark is down two players after Froy Girikanan and Viktor Sedov left their team.

episodes.name: The Truth About Orion
episodes.overview: After their battle with Perfect Spark, the members of Inazuma Japan are disheartened. On the other hand, Asuto, who woke up in a certain person's room, learns about the Orion Foundation's original form.

episodes.name: The Arrow of Artemis
episodes.overview: As Asuto and the others vow to wake up the Disciples of Orion, a new member appears. They were excited about playing against the supposedly non-Orion France, when...

episodes.name: Older Brother and Younger Brother
episodes.overview: In order to look into the incident concerning the French team, Froy and Ichihoshi head to Bernard, the chairman of the Orion Foundation and Froy's older brother. On their way here, Froy tells Ichihoshi about the Bernard he respected. According to him, Bernard had changed after a certain incident.

episodes.name: The Passionate Guys are Here
episodes.overview: Inazuma Japan's match against tournament favorites Brazil begins. Despite the team begin completely Orion, the members of Brazil have overwhelming techniques. Inazuma Japan is outplayed by Brazil, who attacks using the rhythm of samba.

episodes.name: Under the Small Sky
episodes.overview: Asuto feel the Orion Foundation's "light" from the plays of the Brazilian team. However, as the match resumes, Asuto and the other Inazuma Japan members suddenly lose strength and become unable to move.

episodes.name: Let's Do That Soccer
episodes.overview: Inazuma Japan fights against FFI champions. The Brazilian team is shocked by the dirty game of Japan. Inazuma Japan's move, which appears to be retaliation, is gradually causing conflicts for the Brazilian players.

episodes.name: The Witch's Army
episodes.overview: The semi-final match between Inazuma Japan and the Italy national team, Guardians of Queen, is about to start. Guardians of Queen are under direct control of Irina Girikanan and wear mysterious supporters on their arms and legs that increases the strength of their movements and techniques. Because of that, Inazuma Japan struggle against them and are quickly behind with a score of 0-2. How will Inazuma Japan turn this match around?

episodes.name: Poison Apple Equation
episodes.overview: During the match against the Italian team, Inazuma Japan's face distrusts the anomalies in the opponent's body. Inamori Asuto of Inazuma Japan desperately asks them to stop the dangerous game...

episodes.name: Roar! Last Resort
episodes.overview: Inazuma Japan continue their match against Guardians of Queen but the score isn't in favor for Inazuma Japan, being 1-3.

episodes.name: It Began on the Day of the Final Battle
episodes.overview: Inazuma Japan are finally faced with the FFI finals. The members make certain feelings of wanting a fair match against the reborn Russia representatives.

episodes.name: Hold Hands Across the World
episodes.overview:
The match between Perfect Spark and Inazuma Japan comes to a halt as Irina threatens to bomb the stadium & kill everyone inside, unless the various countries of the world agree to pay a ransom.

The ultimate Orion team, Shadow of Orion, appears, prompting the assembly of Zhao Jinyuns, a new team to confront them consisting of players from different national teams.

episodes.name: Tomorrow Comes Beyond the Field
episodes.overview: Zhao Jinyuns continue their fight against the Shadow of Orion.

2.name: Orion no Kokuin
2.overview: Orion no Kokuin revolves around a team called "Inazuma Japan"—composed of the best players of the previous Inazuma Eleven installments—that will act as a Japanese national team and will face teams from around the world.
